entry.title: Gretsch Gold series Rosewood 14x6.5‚Äù Snare Drum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gretsch
Type: Snare Drum
Price: 579.99

$579.99 Gretsch Gold Series Rosewood 14x6.5‚Äù snare drum brand new. Stunnerüî•üî• Gold Series drums by Gretsch use high-grade materials consisting of boutique-level craftsmanship and appointments. Gold Series snares are designed for the discerning player that is looking to add a new, unique sound to their drum kit.

This Gold Series Rosewood snare is features a 9-ply construction and a gloss natural finish. Known as preferred fretboard material, rosewood is a heavy tonewood that produces crisp, bright tone and an articulate attack. The classic Gretsch 30-degree bearing edge maximizes head-to-shell contact. The 14 x 6-1/2" drum is finished with 3mm die cast hoops, a Bolt-on Gold Series badge, Remo USA heads and more.

entry.title: Ludwig Supraphonic 14x6.5‚Äù Snare Drum B Stock
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ludwig
Type: Snare Drum
Price: 475.00

Ludwig 14x6.5‚Äù Supraphonic B Stock. ¬†These are priced well below retail and have very small factory imperfections.¬†

Legendary Snare Crack

The performance-proven Ludwig Supraphonic snare drum can be heard on countless recordings from the 1960s through today.

Famous for its bright, crisp attack, thanks to a chrome-plated, seamless beaded aluminum shell, the snare provides you with a sublime balance of full, resonant tone and cutting snare crack. This snare can be used the on everything from jazz to metal with fantastic results. Featuring a smooth shell and elegant-looking 10 Imperial lugs, the Ludwig Supraphonic snare will make a fine addition to your drum set.

  • 1.7mm Seamless Aluminum Shell
  • 2.3mm Steel Triple Flanged Hoops
  • P88AC Throw Off
  • P35P Butt Plate
  • Ludwig Weather Master Medium Coated Head
  • Ludwig Weather Master Clear Snare Side Head
  • 10 lugs

entry.title: Tama SLP New-Vintage Hickory Snare Drum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tama
Type: Snare Drum
Price: 399.99

$399.99 Brand New Tama SLP 14x5‚Äù New-Vintage Hickory Snare Drumüî•üî• Hickory Snare with Mini Brass Tube Lugs

The TAMA S.L.P. New-Vintage Hickory is built from six plies of select American hickory ‚Äî a relative newcomer to the snare market . Paired with its 8-hole, 2.3mm triple-flanged Steel Mighty Hoops, the New-Vintage Hickory delivers a warm, articulate response and breathy top end that works especially well for jazz, blues, and funk-based styles of music. Offset mini brass tube legs deliver heaping handfuls of those mid-century visuals. All the while, top-shelf TAMA hardware and appointments ‚Äî a Linear-Drive throw off and butt plate, 20-strand Super Sensitive Hi-Carbon snare wires, and premium Evans G1/Snare Side heads ‚Äî supply the New-Vintage Hickory snare with great tone and performance.
